info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 7:36PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...THUNDERSTORMS WITH HEAVY RAINFALL WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN CABARRUS...NORTHWESTERN DAVIE...NORTHEASTERN IREDELL AND WESTERN ROWAN COUNTIES UNTIL 830 PM EDT... At 735 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms with heavy rainfall along a line extending from 8 miles west of Mocksville to near Kannapolis, and moving north at 15 mph. Locations to be impacted include... Kannapolis, Enochville, Cleveland, Harmony, Coddle Creek Reservoir, Mount Ulla, Sheffield and Cool Springs. Very heavy rainfall rates up to 2 inches per hour will be possible in these areas.
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall may flood areas with poor drainage, such as ditches and underpasses. Avoid these areas and do not cross flooded roads. Water levels of small streams may also rise rapidly. Seek higher ground if threatened by flood waters.
